channel.title: Gene Regulation For Crop Improvement on Wenbin Mei
channel.description: Recent content in Gene Regulation For Crop Improvement on Wenbin Mei

item.title: Study Gene Regulation for Crop Improvement
item.description: Gene regulation process can be viewed as molecular traits linking genotype to phenotype including chromatin structure, methylation, transcription, splicing, and translation. I am taking an integrative approaches including functional genomics, evolutionary genomics and statistical genomics to understanding the genetic basis of these molecular traits, regulation between these different molecular traits and their contribution to the phenotypes and the environmental adaptation.
